value:
I wonder if anyone in this world
has powers like mine... I mean,
it is a pretty strange place.

There's no end of wars here, huh?
Not that Fódlan was much better...
Yeah, there are always forces at play.

Hm? I'd be happy to hang around for
a while if you want to chat. I've been
there before, so I get how you feel.

Ughhh... All this standing around is
gonna kill me. Maybe we could do
some weapon maintenance?$k$pOr, and just hear me out, we could
try thinking up a brand new dish.
Come on, it'd be fun!

Over the past few years, I've had to
interact with all sorts of nobles. You
get used to it after a while.

You're $Nu, right?$k$pLooks like what I heard was right on
the money. You're a pretty interesting
person, you know that?
Definitely getting stronger.
I've still got a ways to go.
I'm not stopping anytime soon.

I'll take whatever power I can get.
Maybe this'll be enough to win.

Oh... You called for me, huh. Name's
Shez. With these blades, I'll cut a path
for you through the battlefield.

This place sure is different from
Fódlan. They both have battles, but
the ones here are...unreal.$k$pStill, fighting alongside you has taught
me a few things, and I know I've
gotten stronger.$k$pAt first, I would have just thought of
this like any other job and not even
bothered to celebrate victory.$k$pBut now? Now, I find that the future
of this world is as important to me as
the future of Fódlan.$k$pSo I'm gonna achieve victory in both
worlds. No matter how impossible, I'll
find a way. Just you watch.
I'm unstoppable!
Your luck has run out!
Can't beat me!
I'll put you in your place!
Sorry... everyone...
I have no idea what this blade is made of.
Uh, hey! Could you stop doing things that scare me half to death? Thanks.
Mmm, no. I'm no good at art or anything like that.
If you want to keep spirits high on the battlefield, make sure everybody is well-fed.
I was alone for a long time, but these days, I have the kind of friendships that aren't easy to come by.
Mhm... I need to move.
I can't be pragmatic when it comes to you. My feelings take over. I'm sure you've noticed.
Mm-hmm.
What do we do?
Leave it to me.
